Uses of Class
oracle.ucp.ConnectionAffinityCallback.AffinityPolicy

  • Packages that use ConnectionAffinityCallback.AffinityPolicy 
    Package Description
    oracle.ucp
    Includes both required and optional callback interfaces that are used to implement connection pool features.

    • Uses of ConnectionAffinityCallback.AffinityPolicy in oracle.ucp

      ConnectionAffinityCallback.AffinityPolicy ConnectionAffinityCallback.getAffinityPolicy()
